name: Student Account

facilities.title: low fees
facilities.details: Students often have limited budgets, so they appreciate a bank that offers low or no fees. This can include no monthly maintenance fees, no minimum balance requirements, and low transaction fees.

facilities.title: Free Debit Card
facilities.details: Students need easy access to ATMs to withdraw cash or make deposits. Having access to a large network of ATMs can be especially important for students who are studying away from home so we providing Debot cards for free to the students

facilities.title: Convenience
facilities.details: Students expect a bank account that is easy to access and manage. This includes features such as online and mobile banking, which allow students to check their balances, make transfers, and pay bills from anywhere at any time.

Description: The bank system allows students to open an account that is specifically designed for their needs. This account provides special features such as lower minimum balances, free checkbooks, and other benefits that cater to students financial needs.
